channel.title: My 2 accounts, a pure range/melee and a tank
channel.description:
~~~---Tank---~~~ Stat--now/goal
Attack- 56/80 Defense- 47/99 Strength- 52/70 Hitpoints- 51/?? Range - 50/70 Magic - 30/60 Prayer - 27/60 Mining - 40/41 Agility - 12/35 (For Horror from the Deep) Thief - 21/59 (Easy cash) Fletching - 7/99 (Easy way to get a skill cape)
~~~---Ranger/Strength---~~~ Attack - 40/40 Strength - 40/60 Defense - 10/10 Hitpoints - 38/?? Range - 40/40 Magic - 1/50 Prayer - 19/25 (for protect 1 item prayer)
~~~---Main---~~~ Attack - 73/99 Strength - 68/90 Defense - 70/99 Hitpoints - 71/99 Range - 51/70 Magic - 58/70 Prayer - 44/60 [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/8129/ownedddlv7.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img258.imageshack.us/img258/2636/clintongotownedhv7.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: My 2 accounts, a pure range/melee and a tank
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

Magic is optional, that means you must have range and magic. So…
A tank ranger is def and range…

Read full topic

item.title: My 2 accounts, a pure range/melee and a tank
item.dc:creator: @ScotaloticaS ScotaloticaS
item.description:
@ScotaloticaS wrote:

[quote=“ninjasod, post:13, topic:51283”][quote author=mvp566 link=topic=71884.msg860623#msg860623 date=1170575277]
isint a tank only def and range?
[/quote]
No, tanks consist of all skills, mage, range, attack, defense, and a little strength.
Ranger tanks are def and range[br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2007, 10:10:35 PM[/size][hr]~—Updated February 11—~[br][size=1]Posted on: February 11, 2007, 11:12:59 AM[/size][hr]~—Stats updated February 16—~[/quote]
No, A tank ranger is range mage (Optoinal) and def
A All-Rounder is all skillls

Read full topic

item.title: My 2 accounts, a pure range/melee and a tank
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

Martin:

if your going to get defense 99 then fuck the fletching o.O

I could get 99 fletching quicker than 99 defense tho -.-
And besides, fletching cape owns

And Hax Key, I’m mainly just making the tank with those stats because I want him to pk more than Staking, but I don’t want everything to become maxed so I can have more competition in the wilderness.
If it doesnt really work out, I’ll just start increasing everything to max.

[quote=“Hex Key, post:4, topic:51283”]Whats the purpose of that tank? If its just for duelling ther are just as effective money winners at lower level where there is more competition.

I recommend 70 52 70, it will duel as a boxer aswell and own.

max range and magic aswell for the comabt level. HP> all other stats when duelling.[/quote]

Read full topic
